author: taylor
msg: Im rolling this back. I didn't break the build, and I don't want to have to fix it as I have other work to do. Been interrupted one too many times today and now Im pissed off.
Yes, my commit would make demo non-portable. Thus Im rolling back. So now we're back to having portlets that run everywhere but here.
